channel.title: Knowledge of beeing an ethical hacker
channel.description:
Hello guys,
Couple days ago I posted some questions and you people been very helpful like Nitrax, anon39379707 etc. Thank you guys.
I am looking for knowledge (books, blogs etc ..) about being an ethical hacker. Of course it takes time to learn and understand everything. Some use-able program languages . I would like to try learn everything with baby step by step. Can you guys help me please ? What to learn?
Thank you very much

item.title: Knowledge of beeing an ethical hacker
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Knowledge of beeing an ethical hacker
item.dc:creator: k4m1k4z13r
item.description:
Oh, and also get “Red Team Field Manual”. I got that thing yesterday and that’s something I wanna read twice and the just have it sitting with me while I do my penetration test…

Read full topic
item.source: Knowledge of beeing an ethical hacker

item.title: Knowledge of beeing an ethical hacker
item.dc:creator: k4m1k4z13r
item.description:
Get a copy of the Linux Bible and the “Hacking: The Art of Exploitation”. That’s gonna get you started and walk with you till you get into some internals of how things actually happen in the bare metal…
Cheers

Read full topic
